chapter:
Quintet.net: Manual
Quintet.net: Table of Contents
Johann Niegl
Sirenen
"Sirenen" is a piece composed by german composer Johann Niegl, written for laptop ensemble using Quintet.net in 2014
The settings are following:
5 Performers on stage (+ 5 small monitor speakers on stands placed behind performers.) â€“ Large Semicircle
5 small monitor speakers on stands placed behind performers (positioned in large semicircle)
Audio
5 Audio Channels
5 small monitor speakers on stands placed behind performers. (e.g. Genelec 8030A)
Concept:
Piece is built on noice sounds concept. Performers are controlling the sound through their smartphones, using TouchOSC (needs to be installed separately)
-->
